{"document":{"nodes":[{"data":{"color":"black","source":"The Narrator","time_period":["0s BC"],"unique_sources":["Luke"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"object":"leaf","text":"	"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"1"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"chapter"}],"object":"leaf","text":"20"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"1"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"1"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"1"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"One day as Jesus was teaching the people and preaching the Good News in the Temple, the leading priests, the teachers of religious law, and the elders came up to him. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"2"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"2"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"2"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"They demanded, "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"blue","recipient":"Jesus","source":"Jewish Leaders","time_period":["0s AD"],"unique_recipients":["Jesus"],"unique_sources":["Jewish Leaders"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"2"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"“By what authority are you doing all these things? Who gave you the right?” "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"red","recipient":"Jewish Leaders","source":"Jesus","time_period":["0s BC","Os AD"],"unique_recipients":["Jewish Leaders"],"unique_sources":["Jesus"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"3"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"	3"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"3"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"“Let me ask you a question first,” "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"black","source":"The Narrator","time_period":["0s BC"],"unique_sources":["Luke"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"3"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"he replied. "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"red","recipient":"Jewish Leaders","source":"Jesus","time_period":["0s BC","Os AD"],"unique_recipients":["Jewish Leaders"],"unique_sources":["Jesus"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"4"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"4"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"4"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"“Did John’s authority to baptize come from heaven, or was it merely human?” "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"black","source":"The Narrator","time_period":["0s BC"],"unique_sources":["Luke"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"5"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"	5"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"5"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"They talked it over among themselves. "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"blue","recipient":"Jewish Leaders","source":"Jewish Leaders","time_period":["0s AD"],"unique_recipients":["Jewish Leaders"],"unique_sources":["Jewish Leaders"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"5"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"“If we say it was from heaven, he will ask why we didn’t believe John. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"6"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"6"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"6"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"But if we say it was merely human, the people will stone us because they are convinced John was a prophet.” "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"black","source":"The Narrator","time_period":["0s BC"],"unique_sources":["Luke"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"7"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"7"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"7"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"So they finally replied that they didn’t know. 
	"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"8"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"8"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"8"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"And Jesus responded, "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"red","recipient":"Jewish Leaders","source":"Jesus","time_period":["0s BC","Os AD"],"unique_recipients":["Jewish Leaders"],"unique_sources":["Jesus"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"8"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"“Then I won’t tell you by what authority I do these things.” "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"black","source":"The Narrator","time_period":["0s BC"],"unique_sources":["Luke"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"9"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"	9"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"9"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"Now Jesus turned to the people again and told them this story: "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"red","recipient":"The Crowd","source":"Jesus","time_period":["0s BC","Os AD"],"unique_recipients":["The Crowd"],"unique_sources":["Jesus"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"9"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"“A man planted a vineyard, leased it to tenant farmers, and moved to another country to live for several years. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"10"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"10"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"10"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"At the time of the grape harvest, he sent one of his servants to collect his share of the crop. But the farmers attacked the servant, beat him up, and sent him back empty-handed. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"11"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"11"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"11"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"So the owner sent another servant, but they also insulted him, beat him up, and sent him away empty-handed. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"12"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"12"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"12"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"A third man was sent, and they wounded him and chased him away. 
	"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"13"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"13"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"13"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"“‘What will I do?’ the owner asked himself. ‘I know! I’ll send my cherished son. Surely they will respect him.’ 
	"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"14"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"14"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"14"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"“But when the tenant farmers saw his son, they said to each other, ‘Here comes the heir to this estate. Let’s kill him and get the estate for ourselves!’ "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"15"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"15"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"15"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"So they dragged him out of the vineyard and murdered him.
	“What do you suppose the owner of the vineyard will do to them?” "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"black","source":"The Narrator","time_period":["0s BC"],"unique_sources":["Luke"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"15"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"Jesus asked. "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"red","recipient":"The Crowd","source":"Jesus","time_period":["0s BC","Os AD"],"unique_recipients":["The Crowd"],"unique_sources":["Jesus"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"16"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"16"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"16"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"“I’ll tell you—he will come and kill those farmers and lease the vineyard to others.”"}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"blue","recipient":"Jesus","source":"The Crowd","time_period":["0s AD"],"unique_recipients":["Jesus"],"unique_sources":["The Crowd"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"16"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"	“How terrible that such a thing should ever happen,” "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"black","source":"The Narrator","time_period":["0s BC"],"unique_sources":["Luke"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"16"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"his listeners protested. 
	"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"17"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"17"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"17"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"Jesus looked at them and said, "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"red","recipient":"The Crowd","source":"Jesus","time_period":["0s BC","Os AD"],"unique_recipients":["The Crowd"],"unique_sources":["Jesus"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"17"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"“Then what does this Scripture mean?
"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"17"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"poetry"}],"object":"leaf","text":"‘The stone that the builders rejected 
has now become the cornerstone.’*"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"17"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":" 
"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"18"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"18"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"18"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"Everyone who stumbles over that stone will be broken to pieces, and it will crush anyone it falls on.” "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"black","source":"The Narrator","time_period":["0s BC"],"unique_sources":["Luke"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"19"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"	19"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"19"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"The teachers of religious law and the leading priests wanted to arrest Jesus immediately because they realized he was telling the story against them—they were the wicked farmers. But they were afraid of the people’s reaction. 
	"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"20"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"20"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"20"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"Watching for their opportunity, the leaders sent spies pretending to be honest men. They tried to get Jesus to say something that could be reported to the Roman governor so he would arrest Jesus. "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"blue","recipient":"Jesus","source":"The Pharisees & The Herodians","time_period":["0s AD"],"unique_recipients":["Jesus"],"unique_sources":["The Pharisees","The "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"black","source":"The Narrator","time_period":["0s said, "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"blue","recipient":"Jesus","source":"The Pharisees & The Herodians","time_period":["0s AD"],"unique_recipients":["Jesus"],"unique_sources":["The Pharisees","The know that you speak and teach what is right and are not influenced by what others think. You teach the way of God truthfully. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"22"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"22"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"22"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"Now tell us—is it right for us to pay taxes to Caesar or not?” "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"black","source":"The Narrator","time_period":["0s BC"],"unique_sources":["Luke"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"23"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"	23"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"23"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"He saw through their trickery and said, "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"red","recipient":"The Pharisees & The Herodians","source":"Jesus","time_period":["0s "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"47"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"47"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"20","verse":"47"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"Yet they shamelessly cheat widows out of their property and then pretend to be pious by making long prayers in public.
